CAPROYL CITRIC ACID/PROPYLENE GLYCOL/SUCCINIC ACID COPOLYMER

detailed_info.name: Citric acid
detailed_info.description: Citric acid is one of the main active ingredients in lemon. It is often used to balance the pH (too basic) of cosmetic products. It is also present in some bath products (bath bombs, bath pebbles or "magic powders") because of its effervescent properties.
detailed_info.regulation:
Can be used for preservation purposes mixed with "SIlver Citrate" (Annex V of the cosmetics regulations) under the following conditions:
- 0.2%, corresponding to 0.0024% silver

The mixture should not be used in oral products and eye products.
detailed_info.reference:
